data.message: Hi. I have been contacted by someone saying that she is working for facebook and that I am one of the facebook lottery winners for 2016? Is there a facebook lottery?

replies.message: Hi Ammie. Thanks for checking in with us. This is a scam. Be sure not to release any personal or financial information to the sender. When you see stuff like this on Facebook, please report it to us as spam by using these tips from our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2dHbPaA. -Brad
Hi Brad. Thankyou. I could not open the link, but you confirmed my suspicion. The woman who contacted me is Amanda Jessica.
